CustomField.formula:
IMAGE(
"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=" + MailingStreet + "," + MailingCity + "," + MailingState + "&zoom=13&size=650x250&markers=color:red|" + MailingStreet + "," + MailingCity + "," + MailingState + "&sensor=false"
, "no map available", 250, 650)
CustomField.label: Contact Location
